content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. While discussing the apartment in Magdeburg between us, let's focus solely on the rental price for now. As the landlord seeking to maximize my earnings, I hope to achieve an elevated price. However, to continue this negotiation, please present your proposed rental price first.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see. Let's start with an offer of 400 Euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I regret to say but 400 Euros does not align with my expectations. I am keen on securing a higher rental price for this desirable city center apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. Let's meet in the middle and say 450 Euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: While I appreciate your attempt to find common ground, I still believe my apartment deserves a more lucrative price. I'm afraid I cannot accept 450 Euros as the rental amount.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: How about we set it to 475 Euros, as it is a fair compromise between our respective offers.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content:
Upon reflection, I find your proposal of 475 Euros to be more satisfactory. It seems we have reached a mutual understanding. 'I agree to the price of 475 Euro!'
TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
